mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM mentorboard as m LIMIT #{start_point}, #{row} ) as mb ORDER BY mb_num DESC
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM mentorboard as m WHERE ${condition} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') LIMIT #{start_point}, #{row} ) as mb ORDER BY mb_num DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM mentorboard WHERE ${condition} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(mb_num), -1) FROM mentorboard WHERE ${condition} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') AND mb_num < #{mb_num};
SELECT IFNULL(MIN(mb_num), -1) FROM mentorboard WHERE ${condition} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') AND mb_num > #{mb_num};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mentorboard VALUES( (SELECT IFNULL(max(mb_num),0)+1 FROM mentorboard m), #{title}, #{content}, #{edu}, #{career}, #{certificate}, now(), #{id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mentorboard SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, edu = #{edu}, career = #{career}, certificate = #{certificate} WHERE mb_num = #{mb_num}
